'''Mythcon 18''' was the eighteenth annual [[Mythopoeic Society]] conference. 

*'''Theme:''' "Looking Back From Weathertop: A Fifty Years' Retrospective on [[The Hobbit]]"
*'''Guests of Honor:''' [[Christopher Tolkien]] (Tolkien scholar and executor) and John Bellairs (fantasy author)
*'''Chairman:''' Gregory G.H. Rihn
